appDesc.message: The ultimate Chrome extensions manager, track extensions history, auto enable/disable extensions, recommend extensions

ls_0.message: Community feature is off, you will not see any extensions recommended by NooBoss users or community details for each app.

ls_1.message: No one has recommended any extension for this website yet, do you have a wonderful extension for

ls_2.message: NooBoss needs to see which domain are you visiting in order to get recommendations from NooBoss community(for those who concern about this, you can ask one of your coding friend to check the code of NooBoss, it's open sourced.).

ls_3.message: You do not have any rule yet

ls_4.message: Do you really want to clean and reset everything?

ls_5.message: Do you want to clean the history?

ls_6.message: All logged apps/extensions history has been cleaned

ls_8.message: Now you can set rules for NooBoss to auto manage your apps/extensions

ls_10.message: Now NooBoss will not auto manage your apps/extensions

ls_12.message: NooBoss needs tabs permission to auto manage your apps/extensions

ls_13.message: wow, thank you for clicking this, but NooBoss is not in stable version yet, so no ADs will be shown! NooBoss is an open-sourced software with proud, you will always have the right to show or hide ADs that NooBoss might bring in the future

ls_14.message: NooBoss needs tabs permission to show your extensions recommened by NooBoss users based on current website

ls_16.message: Now NooBoss is ready to serve you

ls_18.message: You chose not to receive any recommendations from NooBoss users nor do you want to recommend and useful extensions

ls_19.message: You are about to leave NooBoss community, by doing so: AInoob(author) will no longer know if anyone is using NooBoss or not, thus he might slows down the NooBoss project or even shuts it down. However, this is your choice, click "OK" if you do not want to send your NooBoss usage data and extensions you are using to NooBox community.(NooBoss never track your personal information)

ls_20.message: Auto state management is disabled, please turn it on in options page to use this feature
